Message:
Sniff, sniff...
It’s coming from over here!

I followed the scent
and scurried into the kitchen.
There, I saw Big Sis
standing in front of a large pot
on the stove.

“Big Sis!
Is that what I think it is...?”

“I knew it, I knew it!
Big Sis remembered after all!”

“Of course!
I’m going to give you
a special candy this year,
so make sure you
look forward to it, okay?”

“Hehe, yaaaay~!♪
I’m so happy I can finally
have Big Sis’s candy again!

I’d always just sat in the kitchen
and watched before,
but this year,
I wanna make candies together!
